languages.text: "Жизнь наша, конечно, бедная... зато не скучная!"
"It's squalid here, sure... but there's never a dull moment!"
languages.original_text: "Жизнь наша, конечно, бедная... зато не скучная!"

traits.locale_text: "It's squalor here, sure... but there's never a dull moment!"
"It's squalor here, sure... but there's never a dull moment!"
"It's squalid here, sure... but there's never a dull moment!"
"It's squalid here, sure... but there's never a dull moment!"
"It's squalid here, sure... but there's never a dull moment!"

languages.text: “是啊，这里很脏乱……但这里的生活从来都不会无聊！”
languages.original_text: "It's squalid here, sure... but there's never a dull moment!"

traits.locale_text: “是啊，这里很脏乱……但这里的生活从来都不会无聊！”

languages.text: «La vida aquí es miserable, sí... pero ¡no hay quien se aburra!».
languages.original_text: "It's squalid here, sure... but there's never a dull moment!"

traits.locale_text: «La vida aquí es miserable, sí... pero ¡no hay quien se aburra!».

languages.text: 「確かにここは汚ねえが…退屈はしねえぞ！」
languages.original_text: "It's squalid here, sure... but there's never a dull moment!"

traits.locale_text: 「確かにここは汚ねえが…退屈はしねえぞ！」

languages.text: "Sicher, es ist dreckig hier ... aber es ist immer etwas los!"
languages.original_text: "It's squalid here, sure... but there's never a dull moment!"

traits.locale_text: "Sicher, es ist dreckig hier ... aber es ist immer etwas los!"

languages.text: « Ça paie pas de mine, c'est sûr, mais au moins, on s'ennuie jamais ! »
languages.original_text: "It's squalid here, sure... but there's never a dull moment!"

traits.locale_text: « Ça paie pas de mine, c'est sûr, mais au moins, on s'ennuie jamais ! »

languages.text: "Tamam, sefalet içindeyiz ama en azından her anımız heyecanlı!"
languages.original_text: "It's squalid here, sure... but there's never a dull moment!"

traits.locale_text: "Burası pis, evet. Ama her zaman çok heyecanlı!"
